about_the_game: “Find Lah!” is a puzzle game with two main features. Players alternate between navigating through mazes and searching for hidden objects, all while exploring iconic Singaporean hangouts. “Find Lah!” was inspired by the nostalgia from classic picture books like “Where’s Waldo”, “Pierre the Maze Detective”, and the more recent digital versions like “Hidden Folks”. “Find Lah!” aims to recreate the nostalgic gameplay and while taking players through locations inspired by iconic vistas from the Garden City of Singapore.
detailed_description: “Find Lah!” is a puzzle game with two main features. Players alternate between navigating through mazes and searching for hidden objects, all while exploring iconic Singaporean hangouts. “Find Lah!” was inspired by the nostalgia from classic picture books like “Where’s Waldo”, “Pierre the Maze Detective”, and the more recent digital versions like “Hidden Folks”. “Find Lah!” aims to recreate the nostalgic gameplay and while taking players through locations inspired by iconic vistas from the Garden City of Singapore.
name: Find Lah!

Recommended:

short_description: This is the demo version of the "Find Lah!". Players can attempt the first 2 stages of the game, adventuring through the streets of Chinatown in search for the protagonist's Grandmother.
